modName: Compatibility Patch - Deadly Mutilation and Requiem
summary: Patch which introduces compatibility between Requiem and Deadly Mutilation.
descriptionHtml:
Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]Â and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34917/?]Deadly Mutilation 1.3.4[/url]

Pick one file - Deadly Mutilation with Requiem Vanilla or Requiem with USKP race fixes (like in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43849/?]Requiem - Hard Times[/url]).

There are no special installation instructions, other than that you must carefully follow the installation instructions of Requiem and Deadly Mutilation.

Load Order:
--------------------------
Skyrim.esm
Updates.esm
Dawnguard.esm
...
Deadly Mutilation.esp
...
Requiem.esp
Other Requiem Patches.esp
Compatibility Patch - Deadly Mutilation and Requiem.esp
--------------------------
author: Utherix
